name: garden pot
description: A special pot for growing plants, maintaining them at comfortable conditions for maximum yield.  It can be crafted with various seeds to plant them.

name: garden pot (growing)
description: A garden pot growing some tasty, unnameable plants.  You shouldn't see this item.

name: garden pot (grown)
description: A garden pot with some ripe, unnameable plants.  You shouldn't see this item.

name: garden pot (growing tomato)
description: This is a garden pot growing tomatoes.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare them for harvest.

use_action.msg: The tomatoes are ready to harvest!

name: garden pot (ripe tomato)
description: This is a garden pot with a ripe tomato plant.  Disassemble to retrieve the tasty 'matos.

name: garden pot (growing wheat)
description: This is a garden pot growing wheat.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.msg: The wheat is ready to harvest!

name: garden pot (ripe wheat)
description: This is a garden pot with wheat ready to harvest.  Disassemble to retrieve it.

name: garden pot (growing hops)
description: This is a garden pot growing hops.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.msg: The hops are ready to harvest!

name: garden pot (ripe hops)
description: This is a garden pot containing blooming hops flowers.  Disassemble to harvest them.

name: garden pot (growing buckwheat)
description: This is a garden pot growing buckwheat.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.msg: The buckwheat is ready to harvest!

name: garden pot (ripe buckwheat)
description: This is a garden pot containing ripe buckwheat stalks.  Disassemble to harvest them.

name: garden pot (growing broccoli)
description: This is a garden pot growing broccoli.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.msg: The broccoli is ready to harvest!

name: garden pot (ripe broccoli)
description: This is a garden pot containing some fully-grown broccoli.  Disassemble to harvest it.

name: garden pot (growing oats)
description: This is a garden pot growing oats.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.msg: The oats are ready to harvest!

name: garden pot (ripe oats)
description: This is a garden pot containing some golden, fully-grown oats.  Disassemble to harvest them.

name: garden pot (growing barley)
description: This is a garden pot growing barley.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

name: garden pot (ripe barley)
description: This is a garden pot containing some ready-to-harvest barley.  Disassemble to harvest it.

name: garden pot (growing carrot)
description: This is a garden pot growing carrots.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.msg: The carrots are ready to harvest!

name: garden pot (ripe carrot)
description: This is a garden pot containing some ripe carrots.  Disassemble to harvest them.  Store away from rabbits.

name: garden pot (growing cotton)
description: This is a garden pot growing cotton.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.msg: The cotton is ready to harvest!

name: garden pot (ripe cotton)
description: This is a garden pot containing white, fluffy cotton bolls ready for the loom.  Disassemble to pluck them.

name: garden pot (growing cabbage)
description: This is a garden pot growing cabbage.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.msg: The cabbages are ready to harvest!

name: garden pot (ripe cabbage)
description: This is a garden pot containing a big cabbage leaf.  Disassemble to harvest it.

name: garden pot (growing cucumber)
description: This is a garden pot growing cucumber.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.msg: The cucumbers are ready to harvest!

name: garden pot (ripe cucumber)
description: This is a garden pot containing ripe cucumbers.  Disassemble to harvest them.

name: garden pot (growing garlic)
description: This is a garden pot growing garlic bulbs.  Once ripe, it can be activated to prepare it for harvest.

use_action.msg: The garlic is ready to harvest!

name: garden pot (ripe garlic)
description: This is a garden pot containing pungent garlic bulbs.  Disassemble to harvest them, or wave it at vampires to scare them.
